name: Wonder Hop
description:
Tap your way through a wondrous land filled with rainbow spewing clouds, bouncy mushroom men and dangerous totems to dodge.

Wonder Hop is a game for all ages and kinds. A simple vibrant one tap game which will have you bouncing through a colourful quirky world and put you in a happy place.

Wonder Hop features:-

• Endless quirky gameplay
• Cute characters
• Bouncy mushroom men
• Dangerous totems
• Keys to magic gates
• Upbeat beats by Ben Burns

We hope you have a wonderful time playing Wonder Hop!

Thanks for playing!
